xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:title: XCCDF Benchmark That References the Validation Content for the rpminfo_test
xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:description: This XCCDF Benchmark references the OVAL Definitions in the validation content for the rpminfo_test.

xccdf:metadata.dc:contributor: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:publisher: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:creator: National Institute of Standards and Technology

xccdf:Profile.xccdf:title: XCCDF Profile That References the Validation Content for the rpminfo_test
xccdf:Profile.xccdf:description: This Profile allows for the tailoring of the validation content for the rpminfo_test.
